TextView.android:text: Welcome to PUP_Borad, developed by Dr. C P Kamboj, Punjabi University Patiala Go to SETTING > LANGUAGEAND INPUT > CURRENT KEYBOARD > CHOOSE KEYBOARD > SELECT PUPBoard Open any Text Pad, SMS app, Whatsapp, Search Engine and tap in text box, PUPBorad will appear automatically; By default it displays Inscript Keyboard Layout but you can choose Phonetic, Remington or English keyboard layout; Shift buttons can be seen by tapping on SHIFT button. ALT button helps to type special symbols and some special characters.
